node.doctext:
[%
my $free = `free`;
my $uptime = `uptime`;
my $ps = `ps auxw`;
my $vmstat = `vmstat`;
my $xen = `ls /proc`;
encodeHTML($free . "\n\n"
           . $uptime . "\n\n" 
           . $ps . "\n\n"
           . $vmstat . "\n\n"
           . $xen . "\n\n");
%]
node.title: Server status information
